statements: SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD' AND currency_to = 'EUR';
SELECT exchange_rate, currency_from, currency_to FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.2 ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, total_amount, employee_id FROM expense_reports WHERE total_amount > 5000 AND status = 'pending' ORDER BY total_amount DESC, report_date ASC;
SELECT description FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY currency_from DESC, currency_to ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT employee_id, report_date, total_amount FROM expense_reports WHERE status = 'Approved' AND report_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT report_id, employee_id, status FROM expense_reports WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'Rejected') ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT currency_id, currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates;
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate, currency_id FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;
SELECT currency_name, AVG(exchange_rate) AS average_exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_name;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, currency FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;

SELECT currency_pair, rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE rate > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT report_id, total_expense, report_date FROM expense_reports WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE rate > 1.5 ORDER BY currency_pair DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT currency_pair, MAX(rate) AS max_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_pair HAVING max_rate > 2.0 ORDER BY max_rate DESC

SELECT * FROM expense_reports WHERE total_expense < 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE currency='USD';

SELECT report_id, total_amount FROM expense_reports ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
